provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

devCenterUri.description: The URI of the Dev Center.

DevCenterUpdateProperties.description: Properties of the devcenter. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

encryption.description: Encryption settings to be used for server-side encryption for proprietary content (such as catalogs, logs, customizations).

displayName.description: The display name of the devcenter.

projectCatalogSettings.description: Dev Center settings to be used when associating a project with a catalog.

networkSettings.description: Network settings that will be enforced on network resources associated with the Dev Center.

devBoxProvisioningSettings.description: Settings to be used in the provisioning of all Dev Boxes that belong to this dev center.

DevCenterEncryptionSet.description: Represents a devcenter encryption set resource.

properties.description: Properties of a devcenter encryption set.

DevCenterEncryptionSetProperties.description: Properties of the devcenter encryption set.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

DevCenterEncryptionSetUpdateProperties.description: Properties of the devcenter encryption set. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

devboxDisksEncryptionEnableStatus.description: Devbox disk encryption enable or disable status. Indicates if Devbox disks encryption using DevCenter CMK is enabled or not.

keyEncryptionKeyUrl.description: Key encryption key Url, versioned or non-versioned. Ex: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek/562a4bb76b524a1493a6afe8e536ee78 or https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek.

keyEncryptionKeyIdentity.description: The managed identity configuration used for key vault access.

type.description: The type of managed identity to use for key vault access.

userAssignedIdentityResourceId.description: For system assigned identity, this will be null. For user assigned identity, this should be the resource ID of the identity.

CmkIdentityType.description: The type of identity used to access the key vault key.

DevboxDisksEncryptionEnableStatus.description: Devbox disk encryption enable or disable status. Indicates if Devbox disks encryption is enabled or not.

DevCenterProjectCatalogSettings.description: Project catalog settings for project catalogs under a project associated to this dev center.

catalogItemSyncEnableStatus.description: Whether project catalogs associated with projects in this dev center can be configured to sync catalog items.

InheritedProjectCatalogSettings.description: Inherited project catalog settings that combine feature state with catalog settings.

DevBoxProvisioningSettings.description: Provisioning settings that apply to all Dev Boxes created in this dev center

installAzureMonitorAgentEnableStatus.description: Whether project catalogs associated with projects in this dev center can be configured to sync catalog items.

CatalogItemSyncEnableStatus.description: Catalog item sync types enable or disable status. Indicates whether project catalogs are allowed to sync catalog items under projects associated to this dev center.

DevCenterNetworkSettings.description: Network settings for the Dev Center.

MicrosoftHostedNetworkEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether pools in this Dev Center can use Microsoft Hosted Networks. Defaults to Enabled if not set.

UserCustomizationsEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether user customizations are enabled.

DevBoxDeleteMode.description: Indicates possible values for Dev Box delete mode.

values.description: Dev Boxes will not be deleted automatically, and user must manually delete. This is the default.
Dev Boxes will be deleted automatically according to configured settings.

AzureAiServicesMode.description: Indicates whether Azure AI services are enabled for a project.

values.description: Azure AI services are disabled for this project.
Azure AI services are enabled for this project and necessary resources will be automatically setup.

DataPlatformMode.description: Indicates whether Data Platform services are enabled for a project.

values.description: Data Platform services are disabled for this project.
Data Platform services are enabled for this project and necessary resources will be automatically setup.

InstallAzureMonitorAgentEnableStatus.description: Setting to be used when determining whether to install the Azure Monitor Agent service on Dev Boxes that belong to this dev center.

DevCenterUpdate.description: The devcenter resource for partial updates. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties of a Dev Center to be updated.

EncryptionSetUpdate.description: The devcenter encryption set resource for partial updates. Properties not provided in the update request will not be changed.

properties.description: Properties of a Dev Center encryption set to be updated.

DevCenterListResult.description: Result of the list devcenters operation

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

EncryptionSetListResult.description: Result of the list devcenter encryption set operation

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

ProjectUpdateProperties.description: Properties of a project. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

devCenterId.description: Resource Id of an associated DevCenter

maxDevBoxesPerUser.description: When specified, limits the maximum number of Dev Boxes a single user can create across all pools in the project. This will have no effect on existing Dev Boxes when reduced.

displayName.description: The display name of the project.

catalogSettings.description: Settings to be used when associating a project with a catalog.

customizationSettings.description: Settings to be used for customizations.

azureAiServicesSettings.description: Indicates whether Azure AI services are enabled for a project.

serverlessGpuSessionsSettings.description: Settings to be used for serverless GPU.

workspaceStorageSettings.description: Settings to be used for workspace storage.

dataPlatformSettings.description: Indicates whether Data Platform services are enabled for a project.

ProjectCatalogSettings.description: Settings to be used when associating a project with a catalog.

catalogItemSyncTypes.description: Indicates catalog item types that can be synced.

ProjectCustomizationManagedIdentity.description: A reference to a Managed Identity that is attached to the Project.

identityType.description: Values can be systemAssignedIdentity or userAssignedIdentity

identityResourceId.description: Ex: /subscriptions/fa5fc227-a624-475e-b696-cdd604c735bc/resourceGroups/<resource group>/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myId. Mutually exclusive with identityType systemAssignedIdentity.

ProjectCustomizationSettings.description: Settings to be used for customizations.

identities.description: The identities that can to be used in customization scenarios; e.g., to clone a repository.

userCustomizationsEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether user customizations are enabled.

ServerlessGpuSessionsSettings.description: Represents settings for serverless GPU access.

serverlessGpuSessionsMode.description: The property indicates whether serverless GPU access is enabled on the project.

maxConcurrentSessionsPerProject.description: When specified, limits the maximum number of concurrent sessions across all pools in the project.

WorkspaceStorageSettings.description: Settings to be used for workspace storage.

workspaceStorageMode.description: Indicates whether workspace storage is enabled.

ServerlessGpuSessionsMode.description: Indicates whether serverless GPU session access is enabled.

values.description: Serverless GPU session access is disabled.
Serverless GPU session access is enabled and necessary resources will be automatically setup.

WorkspaceStorageMode.description: Indicates whether workspace storage is enabled.

values.description: Workspace storage is disabled.
Workspace storage is enabled and necessary resources will be automatically setup.

displayNameSettings.description: Display name settings that will be enforced on this project.

devBoxTunnelSettings.description: Dev box tunnel settings that will be enforced on this project.

serverlessGpuSessionsSettings.description: Serverless GPU sessions settings that will be enforced on this project.

userCustomizationsSettings.description: User customizations settings that will be enforced on this project.

workspaceStorageSettings.description: Workspace storage settings that will be enforced on this project.

ConfigurationPolicies.description: Represents policies to enforce configuration settings on a project.

azureAiServicesFeatureStatus.description: The property indicates the Azure AI services settings on a project.

devBoxAutoDeleteFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether the setting is configurable at Project scope.

devBoxLimitsFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether DevBox limits are configurable at Project scope.

displayNameFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether project display name is configurable at Project scope.

devBoxTunnelFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether DevBox tunnel settings are configurable at Pool scope.

projectCatalogFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether project catalogs are configurable at Project scope.

serverlessGpuSessionsFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether serverless GPU sessions are configurable at Project scope.

stopOnDisconnectFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether stop on disconnect is configurable at Project scope.

userCustomizationsFeatureStatus.description: Indicates whether user customizations is configurable at Project scope.

statusModifiable.description: Indicates whether the feature's status, Enabled or Disabled, is configurable at the Project scope.

valuesModifiable.description: Indicates whether the feature values are configurable at the Project scope.

defaultStatus.description: Indicates the default status of the feature.

defaultValues.description: The default values of the feature

resources.description: Resources that are included and shared as a part of a project policy.

filter.description: Optional. When specified, this expression is used to filter the resources.

action.description: Policy action to be taken on the resources. This is optional, and defaults to allow

resourceType.description: Optional. The resource type being restricted or allowed by a project policy. Used with a given action to restrict or allow access to a resource type.

PolicyAction.description: Indicates what action to perform for the policy.

scopes.description: Resources that have access to the shared resources that are a part of this project policy.

configurationPolicies.description: Configuration Policies part of this project policy.

properties.description: Properties of an project policy to be updated.

DevBoxAutoDeleteSettings.description: Settings controlling the auto deletion of inactive dev boxes.

deleteMode.description: Indicates the delete mode for Dev Boxes within this project.

inactiveThreshold.description: ISO8601 duration required for the dev box to not be inactive prior to it being scheduled for deletion.  ISO8601 format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S.

gracePeriod.description: ISO8601 duration required for the dev box to be marked for deletion prior to it being deleted. ISO8601 format PT[n]H[n]M[n]S.

azureAiServicesMode.description: The property indicates whether Azure AI services is enabled.

description.description: A short description of the environment definition.

parameters.description: Input parameters passed to an environment.

templatePath.description: Path to the Environment Definition entrypoint file.

validationStatus.description: Validation status for the environment definition.

EnvironmentDefinitionParameter.description: Properties of an Environment Definition parameter

type.description: A string of one of the basic JSON types (number, integer, array, object, boolean, string)

readOnly.description: Whether or not this parameter is read-only.  If true, default should have a value.

required.description: Whether or not this parameter is required

ParameterType.description: The type of data a parameter accepts.

values.description: The parameter accepts an array of values.
The parameter accepts a boolean value.
The parameter accepts an integer value.
The parameter accepts a number value.
The parameter accepts an object value.
The parameter accepts a string value.

DataPlatformFile.description: Represents a data platform file catalog item.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

filePath.description: Path to the Data Platform file.

fileName.description: Name of the Data Platform file.

CheckScopedNameAvailabilityRequest.description: The scoped name check availability request body.

name.description: The name of the resource for which availability needs to be checked.

scope.description: The resource id to scope the name check.

ImageDefinitionListResult.description: Results of the Image Definition list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

ImageDefinition.description: Represents a definition for an Image.

fileUrl.description: The URL to the repository file containing the image definition.

imageValidationStatus.description: Validation status of the configured image.

imageValidationErrorDetails.description: Details for image validator error. Populated when the image validation is not successful.

validationStatus.description: Validation status for the Image Definition.

activeImageReference.description: Image reference information for the currently active image (only populated during updates).

autoImageBuild.description: Indicates if automatic image builds will be triggered for image definition updates

tasks.description: Tasks to run at Dev Box provisioning time.

userTasks.description: Tasks to run when a user first logs into a Dev Box.

extends.description: Another Image Definition that this one extends.

ImageDefinitionReference.description: A reference to an Image Definition.

imageDefinition.description: Name of the referenced Image Definition.

parameters.description: Parameters for the referenced Image Definition.

displayName.description: Display name to help differentiate multiple instances of the same task.

timeoutInSeconds.description: Timeout, in seconds. Overrides any timeout provided on the task definition.

condition.description: An expression that must evaluate to true in order for the task to run.

startTime.description: Start time of the task group.

endTime.description: End time of the task group.

status.description: The state of an Image Definition Build.

ImageDefinitionBuildStatus.description: The state of an Image Definition Build.

values.description: The image build has succeeded.
The image build is running.
The built image has failed validation.
The image build has failed.
The image build has been cancelled.
The image build has timed out.

imageReference.description: The specific image version used by the build.

startTime.description: Start time of the task group.

endTime.description: End time of the task group.

errorDetails.description: Details for image creation error. Populated when the image creation is not successful.

imageReference.description: The specific image version used by the build.

startTime.description: Start time of the task group.

endTime.description: End time of the task group.

errorDetails.description: Details for image creation error. Populated when the image creation is not successful.

taskGroups.description: The list of task groups executed during the image definition build.

name.description: The name of the task group.

status.description: The status of the task group.

endTime.description: End time of the task group.

tasks.description: The list of tasks executed during the task group.

displayName.description: Display name to help differentiate multiple instances of the same task.

logUri.description: The URI for retrieving logs for the task execution.
